subtypes.name: Set Transponder
subtypes.desc: Set Transponder mode

inParams.name: mode
inParams.desc: Transponder mode

inParams.name: duration
inParams.desc: number of seconds to run the transponder (valid only when mdoe is transponder)

subtypes.name: Set Transponder RSSI
subtypes.desc: Set the minimum RSSI for the transponder to take action

inParams.name: RSSI
inParams.desc: RSSI value (0-4095)

subtypes.name: Ping
subtypes.desc: Send ping call to satellite (a.k.a dummy function)

subtypes.name: Mute
subtypes.desc: mute the TRXVU

inParams.name: duration
inParams.desc: number of seconds to mute the TRXVU

subtypes.name: Unmute
subtypes.desc: unmute the TRXVU

subtypes.name: Get beacon interval
subtypes.desc: get the beacon interval time in seconds

subtypes.name: Set beacon interval
subtypes.desc: set the beacon interval time in seconds

inParams.name: seconds
inParams.desc: number of seconds for beacon interval

subtypes.name: Transmit beacon
subtypes.desc: Transmit beacon ignoring all tx allow checks

subtypes.name: Set baud rate
subtypes.desc: set the bitrate of the trxvu

inParams.name: bitrate
inParams.desc: the bitrate we want to set in the trxvu (1200 - 00 | 2400 - 01 | 4800 - 02 | 9600 - 03)

subtypes.name: ANT get arm status
subtypes.desc: get the status of one side in the antenna

inParams.name: ant side
inParams.desc: what side we want to know the status (side A - 00 | side B - 01)

subtypes.name: ANT set arm status
subtypes.desc: set the status of one side in the antenna

inParams.name: ant side
inParams.desc: what side we want to change the status (side A - 00 | side B - 01)

inParams.name: status
inParams.desc: what status we want the antenna side to be (disarm = 172 | arm = 173)

subtypes.name: ANT get UPTIME
subtypes.desc: get the UPTIME of one side in the antenna

inParams.name: ant side
inParams.desc: what side we want to know the UPTIME (side A - 00 | side B - 01)

subtypes.name: ANT cancel deploy
subtypes.desc: cancel the deployment of one side in the antenna

inParams.name: ant side
inParams.desc: what side we want to cancel the deployment (side A - 00 | side B - 01)

subtypes.name: Set idel state
subtypes.desc: set the TRXVU idel state

inParams.name: duration
inParams.desc: idle duration time (max 10 minutes) apply only for state ON

subtypes.name: Ant Stop Redeploy
subtypes.desc: Stop the every 30 min ant deploy in the maintiance

subtypes.name: Dump with time range
subtypes.desc: start the dump task

inParams.name: dump_type
inParams.desc: the type of the dump

inParams.name: start time
inParams.desc: start time of dump

inParams.name: end time
inParams.desc: end time of dump - not including this date

inParams.name: resulotion
inParams.desc: dump steps in seconds

subtypes.name: Dump by days
subtypes.desc: start the dump task

inParams.name: dump_type
inParams.desc: the type of the dump

inParams.name: start time
inParams.desc: start date of dump

inParams.name: end time
inParams.desc: end date of dump - not including this date

inParams.name: resulotion
inParams.desc: dump steps in seconds

subtypes.name: Abort dump
subtypes.desc: stop the dump

subtypes.name: Get baud rate
subtypes.desc: get the bitrate of the trxvu

subtypes.name: Get TX uptime
subtypes.desc: get how much time the satellite is on

subtypes.name: Get RX uptime
subtypes.desc: get how much time the satellite is on?

subtypes.name: Get num of online commands
subtypes.desc: get how much commands do the satellite needs to do now

subtypes.name: Update Alpha
subtypes.desc: update the Alpha value for smothing

inParams.name: Alpha
inParams.desc: new Alpha value (float value)

subtypes.name: Get heater values
subtypes.desc: get min & max heater values

subtypes.name: Set heater values
subtypes.desc: set min & max heater values

inParams.name: Min
inParams.desc: [0.01 degC] Battery heater low temperature threshold

inParams.name: Max
inParams.desc: [0.01 degC] Battery heater max temperature threshold

subtypes.name: Rest EPS WDT
subtypes.desc: Resets the watchdog timer keeping the system from performing a reset

inParams.desc: the type of the telematry to delete

inParams.name: start time
inParams.desc: start date of dump

inParams.name: end time
inParams.desc: end date of dump - not including this date

subtypes.name: Delete all files on SD, excluding about.jpg
subtypes.desc: Delete all files on SD

subtypes.desc: Set TLM interval period time

inParams.name: tlm_type
inParams.desc: the type of the telematry to update

inParams.desc: number of seconds between every TLM save

subtypes.name: Get TLM period times
subtypes.desc: Get all TLM period times

subtypes.desc: Get last file system error

inParams.desc: what type to reset do we want to preform
